reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don’t waste your money
reviews.reviewText: Product is cheaply made and doesn’t work well. I got better results using a dog brush on the carpet

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars wow! takes out so much hair!
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely impressed with this product. It was easy to assemble in 2 secs. I use it mainly to remove excess dog hair off my couch, rugs, and carpet. It extends and acts as a broom so you do not have to bend over and use a hand held squeegee. Let me tell you I was amazed at the amount of hair that came out of my carpet and other surfaces my dog lays on! It definitely feels and looks more clean in my living room and with less pet odor. I wish I knew about this earlier. It would have definitely made my life way easier.
